item.title: Jefferies Financial Group Inc 10-K
item.description: Jefferies Financial Group Inc, which is in the Security Brokers, Dealers & Flotation Companies [6211] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 27, 2023 had 58416 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: financial - 971 instances 2022 - 579 instances 30 - 551 instances november - 547 instances securities - 501 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
